_comment: Background Configuration Template - Copy and modify for your own themes
_instructions: 1. Duplicate this file and rename it (e.g., 'my-theme.json')
_instructions2: 2. Replace asset paths with your own images

elements._comment: NORMALIZED MODE (default) - Values 0-1000, maintains exact layout
PERCENTAGE MODE - Values 0-100, stays visible on all screen sizes
elements._example: This element will always be at 50% width, 50% height (center)

normalized.description: Values are 0-1000. Maintains exact layout but elements may go off-screen on different aspect ratios.
normalized.use_case: When you want precise, consistent positioning

percentage.description: Values are 0-100 (percentages). Elements stay visible on all screen sizes/aspect ratios.
percentage.use_case: When you want elements to always be visible, recommended for most cases

_anchor_points.description: Anchor point determines which part of the element is positioned at x,y
options: top-left - Position top-left corner at x,y (default)
top-right - Position top-right corner at x,y
bottom-left - Position bottom-left corner at x,y
bottom-right - Position bottom-right corner at x,y

_all_properties.width: Width in same units as x
_all_properties.height: Height in same units as y

_recommended_setup.description: Use percentage mode for responsive designs

_tips: Use 'percentage' mode to keep elements visible on all screens
Use 'anchor' to control which part of element is at x,y
Center an element: positionMode='percentage', x=50, y=50, anchor='center'
Bottom-right corner: positionMode='percentage', x=100, y=100, anchor='bottom-right'
Keep Z values 1-15: lower values render first (furthest back)
Use opacity 0.5-0.7 for distant elements, 0.9-1.0 for close elements
